column3: content
Write a short story about [protagonist] who discovers [unusual object] in their backyard. The story should include elements of [genre] and end with an unexpected twist.
Refactor this [language] code to be more efficient and follow best practices: [code block]
Create a professional email template for [purpose] to send to [recipient type]. The tone should be [tone] and include a call to action about [action].
Summarize the key findings, methodology, and implications of this research paper: [paper title/abstract]
Write a compelling product description for [product] targeting [audience]. Highlight its [features] and explain the benefits in an engaging way.
I'm getting this error in my [language] application: [error message]. Here's the relevant code: [code block]. What might be causing this and how can I fix it?
Create a recipe for a [dietary restriction] [meal type] using these ingredients: [ingredient list]. Include cooking instructions and approximate preparation time.
Create a detailed character profile for a [character type] in a [setting] fantasy world. Include physical appearance, personality traits, special abilities, and backstory.
I have a dataset about [topic] with these columns: [column names]. Suggest a comprehensive analysis plan to extract meaningful insights, including visualization recommendations.
Create a [intensity level] [duration] workout routine targeting [muscle groups] that can be done [location]. Include sets, reps, and rest periods.
Write an engaging caption for an Instagram post about [topic/product]. Include relevant hashtags and a call to action.
Analyze this website [URL/description] and provide specific feedback on improving its user experience, focusing on navigation, layout, and conversion optimization.
Generate a list of [number] interview questions for a [job title] position that assess both technical skills and cultural fit.
Create a detailed outline for a [length] essay on [topic]. Include main arguments, supporting points, and suggested sources.
Create a comprehensive bug report template for software development teams that captures all necessary information to efficiently diagnose and fix issues.
Plan a [duration] itinerary for a trip to [destination] for a [traveler type]. Include must-see attractions, accommodation suggestions, and local cuisine recommendations.
Write a script for a [duration] podcast episode about [topic]. Include an engaging introduction, discussion points, and conclusion.
Create clear documentation for this [feature/API/function] explaining its purpose, parameters, return values, and usage examples.
Help me prepare for negotiating [situation] with [counterparty]. Provide conversation starters, key talking points, and responses to potential objections.
Break down this complex problem into manageable steps: [describe problem]. Identify potential challenges and suggest approaches for each step.
Create a detailed comparison of [product/service A] vs [product/service B] based on features, pricing, pros and cons, and ideal use cases.
Develop a marketing campaign outline for [product/service] targeting [audience]. Include campaign goals, channels, messaging strategy, and success metrics.
Design a neural network architecture for [specific task]. Specify the layer types, activation functions, and training approach.
Write a short children's story about [character] who learns about [value/lesson]. Use simple language appropriate for [age] year olds.
Write an academic abstract for a research paper about [topic]. Follow standard abstract structure with background, methods, results, and conclusions.
Write a cover letter for someone transitioning from [current career] to [desired career], highlighting transferable skills and addressing potential concerns about the career change.
Create a script for a [duration] YouTube video about [topic]. Include hook, main content sections, transitions, and call to action.
Design a database schema for [application type]. Include tables, fields, data types, relationships, and indexing recommendations.
Create a guided mindfulness exercise focusing on [aspect] that can be completed in [duration] minutes. Use calming, clear language.
Explain this legal document in simple terms: [paste document]. Highlight key points and obligations without legal jargon.
